metadata.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.

properties.displayName: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one

source
properties.description: Load the workflow from the database by ID

options.description: Load the workflow from a locally saved file

options.description: Load the workflow from a parameter

options.name: URL
options.description: Load the workflow from an URL

properties.name: workflowId
properties.description: Note on using an expression here: if this node is set to run once with all items, they will all be sent to the same workflow. That workflow's ID will be calculated by evaluating the expression for the first input item.
properties.hint: Can be found in the URL of the workflow

properties.name: workflowPath
properties.description: The path to local JSON workflow file to execute

properties.name: workflowJson
properties.description: The workflow JSON code to execute

properties.name: workflowUrl
properties.description: The URL from which to load the workflow from

properties.displayName: Any data you pass into this node will be output by the Execute Workflow Trigger. More info
properties.name: executeWorkflowNotice
mode
properties.description: Pass all items into a single execution of the sub-workflow

options.name: Run once with all items
options.description: Pass all items into a single execution of the sub-workflow

options.name: Run once for each item
options.description: Call the sub-workflow individually for each item

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the main workflow should wait for the sub-workflow to complete its execution before proceeding

options.name: waitForSubWorkflow
options.description: Whether the main workflow should wait for the sub-workflow to complete its execution before proceeding

hints.text: Can be found in the URL of the workflow

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
